Interface IDAO<K,T extends AbstractEntity>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICoffeeDAO, IIngredientDAO, IOrderDAO, IUserDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoffeeDAO, IngredientDAO, OrderDAO, UserDAO

    public interface IDAO<K,T extends AbstractEntity>
    Interface IDAO is a base interface consisting essential functionality for operating with a database.

    Andrei Padhaiski
